trans-unit.source: Defines properties and methods common to all annotations.
This is an abstract class.
Annotations are commonly used to comment or elaborate on chart elements such as data points.
Annotations can also be used to draw custom shapes.
By default, annotations are positioned using relative coordinates, with (0,0) representing the top-left corner, and (100,100) representing the bottom-right corner of the chart image.
It is also possible to switch from this relative coordinate system to a system that uses axis values.
With an axis coordinate system, X and Y, which represent the position of the top-left corner of an annotation, are set using X axis and Y axis values, instead of values that range from 0-100.

There are two ways to use axis values when you specify the position and size of an annotation: - Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> or both of these annotation properties to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY%2A> property values of a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A> object.
- Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property to anchor the annotation to a data point.
In this case, its positioning is automatically calculated.
All annotations are derived from the Annotation class, which can be used to set attributes common to all Annotation objects, such as color, position, anchoring and so forth.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> class.
This is the default constructor and should not be used.
<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation> is an abstract class and cannot be created directly.

To create a new annotation object, use constructors of classes such as <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>.
Gets or sets the content alignment of an annotation.

This property is used to align text for the Alignment property to align text for <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> objects, and to align a non-scaled image inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation> object.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> enumeration value that represents the content alignment.
Gets or sets the position alignment of an annotation to the anchor point.

The annotation must be anchored by either using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property, or by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> properties.
Its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> properties must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> enumeration value that represents the alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.
Gets or sets the data point to which an annotation is anchored.
The annotation is anchored to the X and Y values of the specified data point, and automatically uses the same axes coordinates as the data point.

To automatically position the annotation relative to the anchor point, make sure its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> properties are set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorAlignment%2A> property can be used to change the annotation's automatic position alignment to the anchor point.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetY%2A> properties can be used to add extra spacing.

When you use this property, make sure the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> properties are set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>, as they have precedence.
Set this value to `null` to disable annotation anchoring to a data point.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> object to which an annotation is anchored.
Gets or sets the name of a data point to which an annotation is anchored.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the data point that an annotation is anchored to.
Gets or sets the offset from the anchor point for the X position of an annotation.

The annotation must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the offset of the X position from the anchor point.
Gets or sets the offset from the anchor point for the Y position of an annotation.

The annotation must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the offset of the Y position from the anchor point.
Gets or sets the X coordinate to which the annotation is anchored.

The annotation is anchored to the X coordinate and is specified in relative chart or axes coordinates, depending on the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> property value.
To automatically position an annotation relative to an anchor point, make sure its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorAlignment%2A> property can be used to change the automatic position alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetY%2A> properties may be used to add extra spacing.
This property has a higher priority than the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property.
Set this value to <xref:System.Double.NaN> to disable annotation anchoring to the value.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the X coordinate to which an annotation is anchored.
Gets or sets the Y coordinate to which the annotation is anchored.

The annotation is anchored to the Y coordinate and is specified in relative chart or axes coordinates, depending on the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> property value.
To automatically position an annotation relative to an anchor point make sure its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorAlignment%2A> property can be used to change the automatic position alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetY%2A> properties may be used to add extra spacing.
This property has a higher priority than the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property.
Set this value to <xref:System.Double.NaN> to disable annotation anchoring to the value.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the Y coordinate an annotation is anchored to.
Gets the group, if any, in which the annotation belongs to.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup"></xref> object inwhich the annotation belongs to.
Gets or sets the type name of an annotation.
This property is used to get the name of each annotation type, for example, Line, Rectangle, Ellipse, and so forth.
The type name of an annotation.
Gets or sets the X axis to which an annotation is attached.
When an annotation is attached to an axis, its X position is always specified in axes coordinates.
To also define the size of an annotation in axes coordinates, make sure the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property is set to `false`.
Set this value to `null` to disable attachment to the axis.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object to which the annotation is attached.
Gets or sets the name of the X axis which an annotation is attached to.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the X axis which an annotation is attached to.
Gets or sets the Y axis which an annotation is attached to.
When an annotation is attached to an axis, its Y position is always specified in axes coordinates.
To also define the size of an annotation in axes coordinates, make sure the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property is set to `false`.
Set to `null` to disable annotation attachment to an axis.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object which this annotation is attached to.
Gets or sets the name of the Y axis which an annotation is attached to.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the Y axis that an annotation is attached to.
Gets or sets the color of an annotation background.
This property does not apply to line-type annotations, image annotations and text annotations.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw an annotation background.
Gets or sets the gradient style of an annotation background.

Two colors are used to draw the gradients, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.
This property does not apply to line-type annotations, image annotations and text annotations.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> value used to draw an annotation background.
Gets or sets the hatching style of an annotation background.
Two colors are used to draw the hatching, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.
This property does not apply to line-type annotations, image annotations and text annotations.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> value used to draw the background.
Gets or sets the secondary color of an annotation background.

The secondary color is used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackColor%2A> when <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> is used.
This property does not apply to line-type annotations, image annotations and text annotations.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw an annotation background with hatching or gradient fill.
Gets or sets the bottom boundary of an annotation position.

To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property, or set the annotation axes using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property to `false`.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of the bottom boundary of an annotation.
Brings an annotation to the front of all annotations.
Gets or sets the name of the chart area to which an annotation is clipped.
If the chart area name is specified, an annotation will only be drawn inside the plotting area of the chart area specified.
All parts of the annotation outside of the plotting area will be clipped.
To disable chart area clipping, set the property to <xref:System.String>.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that represents the name of an existing chart area.
Releases unmanaged resources and, optionally, managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets or sets the font to use for the text of an annotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object used to draw the annotation text.
Gets or sets the text color of an annotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used for the text color of an annotation.
Gets or sets the height of an annotation.
The height of an annotation can be a negative value, in which case the annotation orientation is switched.
Annotation height can be in relative chart coordinates or in axes coordinates.
Chart relative coordinates are used by default.

To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property, or set the annotation axes using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property to `false`.
Set the height to <xref:System.Double.NaN> to achieve automatic size calculation for annotations with text.
The size will automatically be calculated based on the annotation text and font size.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the height of an annotation.
Gets or sets a flag that determines if an annotation is selected.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the annotation is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the size of an annotation is always defined in relative chart coordinates.
The height and width of an annotation may be set in relative chart or in axes coordinates.
Relative chart coordinates are the default.
To express the size of an annotation in axes coordinates, set the IsSizeAlwaysRelative property to `false`.

Then anchor the annotation to a data point or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Width*> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Height*> of an annotation are always expressed in relative chart coordinates; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the line color of an annotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw an annotation's line.
Gets or sets the line style of an annotation.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> value used to draw the line style of an annotation.
Gets or sets the line width of an annotation.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that defines the line width, in pixels, of an annotation.
Gets or sets the map area attributes of an annotation.
This `string` will be added to the attributes of the image map generated for the annotation.
Special keywords can be used when an annotation is anchored to a data point using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the map area attributes of an annotation.
Gets or sets the unique name of an annotation.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that represents the unique name of the annotation.
Gets or sets the postback value which can be processed on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that is passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
Resizes an annotation according to its content size.
Sets the annotation width and height to fit the specified text.

This method applies to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> objects only.
> [!NOTE] > This method requires that the annotation be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection> to function correctly.
Gets or sets the right boundary position of an annotation.

To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property, or set the annotation axes using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property to `false`.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of the right boundary of an annotation.
Sends an annotation to the back of all the annotations.
Anchors an annotation to the specified data point.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> to which the annotation will be anchored.
Anchors an annotation to two data points.
Anchors an annotation's top-left and bottom-right corners to the specified data points.
The first anchor <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref>.
The second anchor <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref>.
Gets or sets the color of an annotation's shadow.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation shadow.
Gets or sets the size of an annotation's shadow.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the size of the shadow.
Gets or sets the smart label style of an annotation.
Smart labels are used to prevent an annotation from overlapping the data point labels and other annotations.
> [!NOTE] > Data point labels must also have smart labels enabled.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationSmartLabelStyle"></xref> object that represents an annotation's smart labels style properties.
Gets or sets the text style of an annotation.
A TextStyle value used to draw the text of an annotation.
Gets or sets the tooltip text for an annotation.
Special keywords can be used in the text when an annotation is anchored to a data point using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the tooltip text for an annotation.
Gets or sets the URL of an annotation.
Special keywords can be used when an annotation is anchored to a data point using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of an annotation.
Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation is visible.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the annotation is visible; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the width, in pixels, of an annotation.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Height%2A> property description.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that is a percentage of the chart width.
Gets or sets the X coordinate of an annotation.
The X coordinate of an annotation is specified in relative chart coordinates or in axes coordinates.
Relative chart coordinates are used by default.

To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property, or set the annotation axes using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties.

Set the X position to <xref:System.Double.NaN> to automatically calculate position when the annotation has been anchored using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> properties.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the X coordinate position of the annotation.
Gets or sets the Y coordinate of the annotation.
The Y coordinate of an annotation is specified in relative chart coordinates or in axes coordinates.
Relative chart coordinates are used by default.

To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property, or set the annotation axes using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties.

Set the Y position to <xref:System.Double.NaN> to automatically calculate the position when the annotation has been anchored using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> properties.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the Y coordinate position of the annotation.
Gets or sets the name of the Y axis which an annotation is attached to.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the Y axis which an annotation is attached to.
